about_the_game:
In the shadows of Earth's orbit, Noëlle, 18F, awakens aboard the ISS with fragmented memories and a burning desire for vengeance. Descending to Petaputua, a sprawling, neon-lit metropolis, she finds a city drenched in decadence and danger. Here, technology and humanity intertwine in ways both thrilling and forbidden.

Petaputua’s streets are rife with vice and violence. Cybernetic thugs, seductive rogue AIs, and ruthless corporate enforcers dominate the city's underbelly. Each encounter pushes Noëlle to her limits, testing her skills and her resolve.

In this city of sin, power comes at a price. Noëlle must navigate a world of corrupt deals and illicit pleasures to gain the upper hand. Grinding for experience and gold is essential, with rewards that go beyond mere survival—upgrading equipment, learning new, provocative skills, and indulging in the city's dark temptations.

Victor, the enigmatic antagonist, manipulates the chaos from the shadows. His true motives remain hidden, but his influence pervades every corner of Petaputua, driving Noëlle towards a confrontation that promises to be as intimate as it is deadly.

  • 13+ enemies - 4 bosses - 62 H-animations (36 Uniques)!

  • Upgrades and Hentai Statistics Pages

  • Unique Voice Acting

  • Multiple Original Music Tracks

  • 5 Different levels

content_descriptors.notes:
Lustful Victor contains the following content:
- Erotic outfits, explicit language, sexual comments and adult situations
- Sex scenes (consensual sex, non consensual, fellatio, masturbation, erotic massage)
-Scene with fantasy and cybernetic beasts (beastiality)
- All characters in Lustful Victor are 18+

name: Lustful Victor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64Bit). or Linux (Steam OS)
  • Processor: Dual Core Pentium or equivalent Processor
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 2000 or equivalent Graphics
  • Storage: 76.5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64Bit). or Linux (Steam OS)
  • Processor: Dual Core Pentium or equivalent Processor
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 2000 or equivalent Graphics
  • Storage: 76.5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
